articles.title: Milwaukee Bucks' Khris Middleton had surgery in early July to repair torn ligament in wrist, sources say
articles.description: Bucks All-Star Khris Middleton underwent surgery to repair a torn ligament in his left wrist earlier this month and is expected to be fully recovered to return sometime near the start of the regular season, sources told ESPN.

articles.title: New Orleans Pelicans draft pick E.J. Liddell suffers torn ACL in right knee, out indefinitely
articles.description: New Orleans Pelicans second-round pick E.J. Liddell suffered a torn ACL in his right knee during Monday's summer league contest and will be out indefinitely.
articles.content:
LAS VEGAS -- New Orleans Pelicans second-round pick E.J. Liddell suffered a torn ACL in his right knee during Monday's summer league contest and will be out indefinitely.

articles.title: Le'Veon Bell says he is shifting his focus to boxing, won't play in NFL this season
articles.description: Running back Le'Veon Bell said Tuesday that he won't be playing in the NFL this season as he shifts his focus to boxing.

articles.title: Sources - Utah Jazz now willing to listen to Donovan Mitchell trade scenarios
articles.description: The Jazz are now showing a willingness to listen to trade offers for All-Star guard Donovan Mitchell, sources told ESPN's Adrian Wojnarowski. Utah's asking price appears to be steep after dealing Rudy Gobert for a bundle of assets.

articles.title: Judge rules blood alcohol test results allowed as evidence in case of former Las Vegas Raiders receiver Henry Ruggs III, charged in fiery crash that killed woman, dog
